posts.post_content:
If anyone here happens to own Lionel Carter’s Charlie Rhodes I would be interested in buying or trading for it. I have some Lionel Carter collection T206 to trade or other T206 available. 

Thanks

Was able to add the above card to my collection:D This Board is a really great place to reach out to so many fellow collectors and make purchases and the occasional trade(very uncommon for me). It is pretty amazing when you are searching for a specific card or very rare and can find it here. It has happened for me several times here. 

Thanks Rob 

Thanks Leon, for running such a great place to learn so much and add to our collections.
